title: nirviSayanAi
sahitya:
nirviSayanAi shaTrE nirvikalpa samAdhi nilaittE nAn sukhippadenrO paramAtmanE


anupallavi

  sarvAntaryAmiyE sadguru svAmiyE sahaja niSTaikk-ennuLLam vikasikka sheidaruL


caraNam    kAma krOdha lObha mOhAntakAramAm kATTai nI tANDuvittAi
nAma japa tapa dhyAna mOnattAr-shiva jnAnattai tUNDuvittAI
tAmadiyAmal en dAham taNindenrum tanmayAnandattil un mayanAgiyE
